tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Cat receiving signals from another planet

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Thank you, Captain Obvious!﻿
My cat too, so respond, but when he saw a bird outside the window ;DD﻿
Aww those are cat chirrups... Or﻿ dubstep.
WATCH MY﻿ VIDEOS
mines dead and it﻿ still makes noise..is that normal?

Ah, my﻿ cat also do that. When cat had its eye on a lizard.
ウチの猫も、ヤモリ狙ってる時に同じ声出します。

My cat sometimes stares at something in the room and there is nothing there, like it's looking at a ghost. Anyhow cats are intelligent, I asked my cat who the ex-general of China was and he replied 'Mao.' CORRECT your being fed! (My cat's﻿ a bit old...)
thats what﻿ cats want you to think
Nice try﻿ NASA.
Saw this﻿ years ago...repost...
I wish my cat did this﻿ hhahahaha
The cat is chirping they do that when they see something they want it was probable watching a squirrel or a﻿ bird
thats﻿ what﻿ cats want you to think
I saw this vidéo before it was made. Good for you. Hipster.﻿
That's Mr.Kat﻿ from kid vs Kat
Morse code?﻿

to﻿ me, he's saying
I WANT THAT BIRD
He is receiving warning signal from curiosity ,﻿ attack is imminent !
normal among of cats, some do﻿ like this
Its like if a cat tried﻿ to bark.
MARS ATTACK NACK NACK!﻿

He's really cute but my cat does make this voice when he sees laser which he can't get physically because it's a light. Cats make that noise when﻿ he sees something and he knows he can't get it. They are frustrated by the objects they can't hunt.
i think he's actually﻿ trying to be a chicken

Reviewer.Books: 1. Pawns in the Game ~ William Guy Carr 2. Evolution from Space ~ Sir Fred Hoyle & Chandra.Wick ~ 3. Bruce Lee, Artist of Life ~ Edit: John Little 4. Aikido & the Harmony of Nature ~ Saotome 5. Of Mice & Men ~ John Steinbeck 6. The Art of war ~ Sun Tzu 7. My family and other animals ~ Gerrald Durrell 8. (1984) ~ George Orwell
honky,Nothing to Envy,How Starbucks Saved My Life、深夜特急、The Lord of the Flies,Pyongyang, three cups of tea
Reviewer.Location: Somewhere in da menance earth, JP
Reviewer.Movies: Bounty hunter, Slumdog Millionare, サマーウオーズ、等
Reviewer.Music: mostly Rap, Heavy Metal, and many others
mostly anything, not a bog fan of country though
